document_data.name: Chijiriki
document_data.mainbody: A '''Chijiriki''' ({{Pronounce|chee|jee|ree|kee|refs=}}) was a weapon unique to the continent of [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Description: A chijiriki was a standard [[spear]] between {{SIrange|7|10|ft|long=yes}} in length that has been augmented with a length of weighted chain attached to its butt end. It offered the versatility of being used as a regular spear for thrusting and striking, while the weighted [[chain]] on the opposite end allowed for tripping attacks. By swinging the butt end, the weapon entangled an opponent, providing a means of immobilization or control during combat.
